version_description:
* Added pet system! Dog will follow you all the way and help you find key items! It will reduce the fear atmosphere and help you complete level faster!
* Added daily login system, login to claim great rewards!
* Added wheel function, spin the wheel to get the reward you want!
* Added storage box which can store items such as dog food, lottery ticket and so on! 
* Added some new items which can be checked in game!
* Added regional reminder! 

Welcome to share your ideas with us!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EndlessNightmareGame/

* Optimized game performance, give you a better gaming experience!

We prepared a big benefit event for you on Facebook, come to join it!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EndlessNightmareGame/
